body:
Hey guys, I thought I would make a small introduction ^_^
My name is fishisea, I'm 14 years old, and I recently re-joined this server.

Last time i was on was when it was still McZone, although I hardly ever played.
I am a big fan of  PvP and building.
I mostly play on Prxcraft, since it was my first and my fav server.
But from time to time I come to play some nexus. (Huge fan of Nexus)

Looking forward to meeting some of you guys!
Ask any questions below ^_^


This is me o_o   ->

replies.body: Hello! Welcome back to what is now called Avicus!
replies.body_tagged: Hello! Welcome back to what is now called Avicus!

replies.body:
Hey, you seem pretty cool! I hope you have fun here!

Classic AMA questions: 
1. What's your favorite color and why?
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds)
5. Is your power level over 9000? 
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?
replies.body_tagged:
